snippet: Ahn Cheol-soo, a software magnate who has inspired speculation of a presidential run, donated about $195 million.
abstract: Ahn Cheol-soo, a South Korean software magnate and university dean, whose presidential ambitions are among the biggest unknowns in this election year, says that he will start a charity to help tackle widening social and economic inequality, a major grievance here.
lead_paragraph: Ahn Cheol-soo, a software magnate who has inspired speculation of a presidential run, donated about $195 million.

headline.seo: South Korean Political Star Starts Charity to Confront Inequality
headline.main: Political Star Starts Fund to Benefit South Korea
headline.print_headline: Political Star Starts Fund To Benefit South Korea
